title: Moonglow Seeds
summaries: Moonglow Seeds are a type of seed that can be obtained from harvesting Moonglows while they are blooming or using the Staff of Regrowth on naturally grown Moonglows while they are fully grown. Moonglow will only bloom at night, and will glow and give off blue orbs of light. Each plant drops 1–3 Moonglow Seeds when harvested while blooming.

Moonglow Seeds can be placed on Jungle grass, empty Clay Pots, or any types of Planter Boxes, and will grow into harvestable Moonglows. They will grow anywhere, not just in the Jungle, but will only yield seeds when blooming.
